titles.title: A bill to amend section 101 of title 11, United States Code, relating to eligibility to serve on chapter 11 committees.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1418)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy law to consider as persons, for purposes of eligibility to serve on creditors' and equity security holders' committees, government units that are: (1) guarantors of pension benefits payable by or on behalf of the debtor; or (2) the legal or beneficial owners of an asset of an employee pension benefit plan that is a governmental plan or an eligible deferred compensation plan.
